overview:
Scott Rutherford is Director of business strategy, development and marketing at NTI Santoni, a business intelligence provider based in southern California.

As licensed private investigators (CA PI 12689), the company’s professional services provide crucial evidence necessary for business decisionmaking, claims determination and litigation. The company operates National Trademark Investigations (www.nationaltrademarkinvestigations.com), a specialized provider of services for intellectual property professionals, attorneys and brand owners, including proactive common law brand monitoring and evidence aquisition services, and Santoni Investigations (www.santoni-investigations.com), which provides extensive services for insurance organizations to manage risk through claims validation, including sub rosa/surveillance operations.
